document_data.name: Paralyze
document_data.mainbody: '''''Paralyze''''' was a [[necromancy]] spell that allowed the caster to immobilize creatures with a successful touch attack.
document_data.Effects: This spell gave the caster a paralyzing touch for a number of minutes equal to his or her experience level. For the duration, any living creature successfully touched (as an attack) by the caster was paralyzed for a few minutes unless they were able to resist the spell. [[Undead]] and non-living creatures like [[golems]] were immune to this spell, as were any creatures naturally immune to paralysis.
document_data.Components: In addition to verbal and somatic components, this spell required a bit of [[ghoul]] flesh to cast.
